page.title: 04HOME LIFE-A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: I am Simon Prickett,aged 11.I have one brother and no sisters.This is a typical day in my life.It is 7.30 a.m on a Wednesday morning.My alarm wakes me with its usual call.About ten minutes later I get out of bed and go downstairs for breakfast.While it is cooking I feed the goldfish.When my bacon is ready to eat I take it out of the grill and make a sandwich. After breakfast I go outside to check the mouse traps.We have not caught anything today.Just before I go to school at around 8.30 I feed our tropical fish the bacon left over from breakfast.I shout "goodbye,"to my parents and start my walk to school. Our school is called Gotham Primary and it is about 10 minutes walk from our house.
